subsection_content:
Proteinuria needs to be treated as soon as possible, so patients need to see a doctor as soon as they discover they have symptoms of proteinuria.
Because of self-diagnosing the type of proteinuria at home, it is difficult for patients to know what type of proteinuria they have, whether it affects the kidneys or not. It is essential to immediately see a doctor when you suspect proteinuria so that the patient can receive timely treatment, ensure kidney health and reduce possible risks.
subsection_title: dam nieu.json. When to see a doctor?

Proteinuria needs to be treated as soon as possible, so patients need to see a doctor as soon as they discover they have symptoms of proteinuria.
Because of self-diagnosing the type of proteinuria at home, it is difficult for patients to know what type of proteinuria they have, whether it affects the kidneys or not. It is essential to immediately see a doctor when you suspect proteinuria so that the patient can receive timely treatment, ensure kidney health and reduce possible risks.
